posts.post_title: WTB t206 Cobb green or bat on
posts.post_content: Looking to spend around $1000, so I guess that puts it around good/vg and it can be raw or graded
I have a PSA 2 Cobb with green background I would take $925.00 shipped. If  interested I can send scan. Thanks Daryl [url]email-bafraley@msn.com[/url]
